page.title: 06THE WOMENS INSTITUTE
page.content: The Women's Institute has grown over the last twenty years in the Lymm area. According to one of its members who is a past president of the local organisation. She said the Woman's Institute does a lot of work for charity in the area and as well as helping by visiting pensioners they raise money from jumble sales. They also have meetings where people give talks and demonstrations on subjects like flower arranging or travel. They also arrange trips and days out for their members. Twenty years ago there was one branch of the Women's Institute in the area, now there are three.
